Articles.Content: I'm working on Munar and Dunan bases. Is there any pack that makes manned rover construction easier? Thank you

You might check chaka monkey, by YANFRET! He has a rover, lander, and a lot of other stuff in his wip mod (download already exists on his page.

- - - Updated - - -

Here's the link:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/124388-1-0-2-Chaka-Monkey-Exploration-Systems?p=1997211#post1997211
